basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Woody Gaddis Photography

description: This scholarship was created to honor the memory of Woody Gaddis who worked as a professional photographer for the Tulsa World and Hopkins Studio before becoming a photography professor at UCO. Woody was very instrumental in furthering the study of photography as a profession for many students, and the photo lab at UCO is named for him. This scholarship is awarded to a Photographic Arts major. Eligibility Requirements Declared Photography major Junior or Senior standing in the fall that the scholarship is awarded Minimum 3.0 GPA Enrolled in 12 credit hours Active in Mass Communication activities
